com.air.mobilebrowser
Class AIRAudioRecorder

java.lang.Object
  com.air.mobilebrowser.AIRAudioRecorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.media.MediaRecorder.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaRecorder.OnInfoListener
public class AIRAudioRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.media.MediaRecorder.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaRecorder.OnInfoListener

Wrapper around MediaRecorder that handles initializing, stopping, and canceling a standard recording.
